text: I think someone pointed this out before but if you use the "Form" field, this doesn't give you the same options as the normal form module which includes the ability to add to workflows. Is this something that will be updated to include this option?

Heya <@U2H3TT8F2>! Default modules are a combination of several fields. Not something that is on our roadmap to modify, as it gives developers much more control over available options. There's some documentation on this here: <https://designers.HubSpot.com/how-to-create-a-form-module-in-a-custom-module> but I'm all ears if you have thoughts/feedback about it.

ah good to know I can add those in using this. I think they should be there by default as a lot of dev (I would think) would expect the form field behavior to work in similar fashion to the normal module.
Makes sense to have it built as you do for the ability to have more control over options, just something I dont think many devs know about
Maybe instead have options in the module to show/hide the additional options such as workflow, goto webinar, override notifications, and more from the front end user
